title: The Biden administration moves to make broad, transgender sports bans illegal
description: The proposed changes to Title IX would still give schools some flexibility to ban transgender athletes depending on age and sport.

title: New Zealand's Jacinda Ardern takes on a new role after leaving politics this week
description: In a rousing and personal farewell speech this week in parliament, the former prime minister touched on family, politics and one of the very few things she will ask of her colleagues as she departs.

title: FDA pulls the only approved drug for preventing premature birth off the market
description: The drug had been fast-tracked for approval under the agency's accelerated approval program, and has been available for more than a decade, despite the drugmaker's failure to prove that it works.

title: Trans girls can play girls' sports in West Virginia after SCOTUS doesn't intervene
description: The state's law was challenged by a 12-year-old  transgender girl named Becky Pepper-Jackson, who has lived as a girl since fourth grade, according to court papers.

title: Feds barged into the wrong hotel room during a drill, then detained the guest inside
description: U.S. Army Special Operations Command and the FBI-Boston Division interrogated the wrong person during a training exercise on Tuesday: an airline pilot who was asleep at the time, per local media.

title: A Good Friday funeral in Texas. Baby Halo's parents had few choices in post-Roe Texas
description: When she gave birth to her baby with a fatal condition two months early, Samantha Casiano scrambled to raise funds for the funeral. Anti-abortion advocates say Texas laws are "working as designed."

title: A Biden administration review of Afghanistan withdrawal blames Trump
description: The review blames the "conditions created by his predecessor" for the way the U.S. ended its more than two-decade-long military presence in Afghanistan. It is being sent to Congress today.

title: What to know as the Tennessee House votes on expelling 3 Democrats
description: Republicans say the trio's protest over gun laws amounted to an insurrection. Reps. Gloria Johnson, Justin Jones and Justin Pearson face a disciplinary measure used only twice since the 1800s.

title: Debris is found during a search for a Japanese army helicopter carrying 10
description: A missing Black Hawk carrying 10 crew members is believed to have crashed into the sea off a southern island after objects appearing to be aircraft parts were spotted in the area, an official said.

title: Auschwitz Memorial calls WWE 'shameless' for using its image in a match promo
description: A shot of the Nazi concentration camp appeared briefly in a shot promoting a match between Dominik and Rey Mysterio on Saturday. The Auschwitz Memorial called the move "shameless."

title: 'The House Is on Fire' spotlights privilege, sexism, and racism in the 1800s
description: Rachel Beanland's historical novel chronicles the burning of a theater and its aftermath in Virginia in 1811, while also tackling the rampant racism and misogyny of the times in the process.

title: 5 new YA books that explore the magic of the arts and the art of magic
description: Art and magic so often go hand in hand. These new YA releases all explore both art and magic as the means to heal trauma, communities — and even worlds.

title: The price of a ballot signature is way up, and experts worry it's encouraging fraud
description: A scandal affecting Michigan Republicans last year highlighted instances of suspected fraud in the signature-gathering process. Some states are now looking to crack down on bad actors.

title: Golf has a problem: people are hitting the ball too far
description: There's a storm brewing in the golf world over how far the best players are able to pound the ball. The proposed solution isn't winning over many fans either.

title: Airline passengers could be in for a rougher ride, thanks to climate change
description: Research in recent years has pointed to more incidents of clear-air turbulence in the jet stream brought on by rising temperatures. Airline crews and passengers are feeling the effects firsthand.

title: America's roads are more dangerous, as police pull over fewer drivers
description: The fatality rate on America's roads remains higher than before the pandemic, and some blame the increase on less traffic policing

title: Top Saudi and Iranian envoys meet in China for a deal that could remake the region
description: Their first high-level public meeting in years was held in China, which brokered an agreement last month

title: A man accused of dealing drugs that led to Michael K. Williams' death pleads guilty
description: Irvin Cartagena, 39, allegedly sold fentanyl-laced drugs to an undercover NYPD officer on several occasions. Narcotics found in William's apartment were linked back to Cartagena, police say.

title: The governors from Indiana and Idaho sign bans on gender-affirming care
description: Governors in Indiana and Idaho sign into law bills banning gender-affirming care for minors, as Republican-led legislatures continue to curb LGBTQ+ rights this year.

title: Hundreds of thousands lose power as freezing rain hits Ontario and Quebec
description: Freezing rain and thunderstorms pummeled parts of Ontario and Quebec on Wednesday, knocking out power for about 800,000 people, officials reported.
